name: Arachnophobia (itch) (gamesbyJP)
description:
warning: mild use of flashing lights.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Move: WASD / ARROW

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Mouse click

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

In Arachnophobia, you shoot spiders while trying to survive.

It's an iteration of the bullet hell genre with a twist: the bullets are substituted by spiders :)

It was submitted as an entry for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022.
